context.text: Huddersfield Town F.C. records - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Name Nation League Goals FA Cup Goals FL Cup Goals Other Goals Total Career
The following players have scored more than 60 league goals for Huddersfield Town. Statistics correct up to May 3 , 2008 .
The following players have played more than 250 league and cup appearances for Huddersfield Town. Statistics correct up to May 3 , 2008 .
These players have achieved the best consecutive scoring runs in the club's history.

Most doubles (home & away wins against same opponent) against: 6 1950-51 season , 1974-75 season and 1987-88 season . Least doubles (home & away wins against same opponent) against: 0 1912-13 season , 1919-20 season , 1923-24 season , 1924-25 season , 1925-26 season , 1926-27 season , 1935-36 season , 1954-55 season , 1961-62 season , 1969-70 season and 1982-83 season .
Huddersfield Town FC v d e

Most doubles (home & away wins against same opponent) for: 9 1919-20 season . Least doubles (home & away wins against same opponent) for: 0 1936-37 season , 1951-52 season , 1970-71 season , 1971-72 season , 1985-86 season and 1987-88 season .
Highest transfer fee paid: 1.2 million Marcus Stewart , from Bristol Rovers , July 1996. Highest transfer fee received: 2.75 million Marcus Stewart , to Ipswich Town , February 2000.
Longest run of league matches without a win: 22 November 27 , 1971 to April 29 , 1972 . Longest run of matches without a win: 19 August 26 , 2000 to November 25 , 2000 .
